location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter by Felix Jones, Political Agent with the Field Force and Resident in the Persian Gulf, to the Governor of the Town and District of Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter contains two related documents:Proclamation by Felix Jones, done on 9 December 1856 aboard of the Frigate Assaye,to the Governor of the Town and District of Bushire, informing him that the city has been seized and that the has time until the following day to surrender.Proclamation of British occupation of the Town and District of Bushire, by Felix Jones, Political Resident at the Bushire Residency on 11 December 1856, the conditions of the occupation are given hereby, listing rights and duties for the inhabitants.
